content: Is there something else I should do in #11839? I know it's not very interesting, but I promise it will be used for something nice! I can even make the main lemma private if we prefer. Thanks!

I don't think the main lemma needs to be private! This is well out of my area so I haven't tried to review it, but it looks like a reasonable approach at a glance. If there aren't comments from someone else who knows what's going on, I'm happy to merge it
Thanks! It's the zero step of an induction (all the other coefficients are divisible by p), that unfortunately it's essentially as annoying as the lemma, but this is for another PR.
